s_title: The Dukes of Hazzard - Racing for Home
s_synopsis: The Dukes are back! Climb behind the wheel of the General Lee and tear through the hills of Hazzard in in the craziest smash 'em up drive-like-a-maniac racing game you've ever played. It's a dream come true as you outrun Rosco, race to save the Duke farm and rescue Daisy from the clutches of Black Jack Perril.
